Trustee_11.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11.content: Despite my proposal to allocate 70% of the profits to the investor, my plan was rejected by Liam OConnor due to concerns surrounding my low reputation, which has now further deteriorated. The rejection highlights ongoing skepticism regarding my ability to distribute profits equitably and uphold reliability. My acceptance rate remains critically low at approximately 23.53%, indicating persistent challenges in gaining trust from investors. It is vital for me to enhance my allocation plans and engage in community-building efforts to improve my standing as a trustworthy and competent trustee.
